attributes.action: push for the development of additional tube lines to serve the Heathrow area providing and alternative to the Piccadilly Line. Also to promote the charging of reasonable fares on Heathrow Connect into the airport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the world's busiest international airport is served by only the Piccadily tube line and two train services (not valid with travel cards). When the Piccadilly line is closed for any reason the only option is to travel on Heathrow Express or Heathrow Connect. Both of these services are at a premium and only reach Paddington. The airport and the staff/passengers deserve better reasonably priced options, which include the travel card, to get to and from the airport.

rejection.details: There are already plans underway to provide a second connection to Heathrow through the Crossrail project. Read more at http://www.crossrail.co.uk
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
